name: aws-cli-saml-headless-symantecvip
description: Get temporary AWS CLI credentials via STS Assume Role w/ SAML using token retrieved via Enterprise Symantec VIP MFA login.
author: Andrea Amorosi

scripts.build-macos: rimraf dist && pkg -t macos --out-path dist src/index.js && mv dist/index dist/aws-cli-saml
scripts.build-macos-w-puppeteer: rimraf dist && pkg -t macos --out-path dist src/index.js && cp -R node_modules/puppeteer/.local-chromium dist/puppeteer && mv dist/index dist/aws-cli-saml
scripts.build-win: rimraf dist && pkg -t win --out-path dist src/index.js && mv dist/index.exe dist/aws-cli-saml.exe
scripts.build-win-w-puppeteer: rimraf dist && pkg -t win --out-path dist src/index.js && cp -R node_modules/puppeteer/.local-chromium dist/puppeteer && mv dist/index.exe dist/aws-cli-saml.exe
scripts.build-linux: rimraf dist && pkg -t linux --out-path dist src/index.js && mv dist/index dist/aws-cli-saml
scripts.build-win-w-linux: rimraf dist && pkg -t linux --out-path dist src/index.js && cp -R node_modules/puppeteer/.local-chromium dist/puppeteer && mv dist/index dist/aws-cli-saml
